summary: Harden automation governance for external receipts

steps.title: Canon-update
steps.notes:
cmd> cat > governance/core/L6 - automation/automation.md
cmd> apply_patch governance/core/L3 - properties/properties.md
cmd> apply_patch governance/core/L4 - architecture/bindings.yml
cmd> apply_patch governance/anchors.json

steps.title: Metrics-dash
steps.notes: cmd> apply_patch docs/workflow.md (external feed task)\ncmd> python -m tools.external.summary --threshold-hours 24 --out _report/usage/external-summary.json

steps.title: Packaging
steps.notes:
cmd> apply_patch pyproject.toml (expose CLI entrypoints)
cmd> apply_patch docs/automation.md (mention new CLIs)
cmd> python3 -m tools.external.summary --threshold-hours 24 --out _report/usage/external-summary.json
